body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Charles Ward from GiggleBox Comedy Club. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm having an issue with a return. I'm not sure how to proceed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that, Frances. Could I get your last name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ms. Patterson. Can I also have your email address to look up your account details?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. To confirm, you're looking to return tickets, is that correct?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that's right. I'm just feeling a bit nervous about the whole process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Frances. No need to worry. We'll make this as smooth as possible for you. I'll just need the order number.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, it's one zero zero two. Thank you for being so patient.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, and thank you for providing that information. I'll initiate the return now. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything. Thank you for your help, Charles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure, Frances. Thank you for calling GiggleBox Comedy Club. Have a great day!
